episodes.title: Way of the Ninja
episodes.description: Kai and Nya, the blacksmith siblings, are recruited by Master Wu, the wise ninja master, to stop his evil brother Garmadon and his skeleton army. They join Jay, Zane, and Cole, the other ninja students, and embark on a mission to find the Golden Weapons of Spinjitzu, the ultimate power. In the Caves of Despair, they face a fierce challenge for the Scythe of Quakes. Watch them use their skills and courage in this action-packed episode of Lego Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu!
